cookingTips: Butterfly pork chops by cutting horizontally through the center without cutting all the way through
Brush with honey and Worcestershire glaze while cooking
Cook over medium-high heat for 4-5 minutes per side until internal temperature reaches 145°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Butterflying pork chops creates a thinner cut that cooks quickly. How confident are you working with pork and achieving proper doneness?
